arts.ttl: 'I know him really well' - Joao Pedro explains classy assist at Bournemouth as Fabian Hurzeler heaps praise on 'unbelievable' talisman
arts.sum: Joao Pedro was the difference maker once again as Brighton secured a hard-earned three points at Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: 'It was not a foul' - Fabian Hurzeler calls for Carlos Baleba red card to be rescinded
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler has insisted that Brighton midfielder Carlos Baleba should not have been sent off at Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: Brighton start to season no surprise - Hurzeler
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion head coach Fabian Hurzeler tells Match of the Day's Gary Lineker that his side's start to the season is no surprise after their 2-1 victory over Bournemouth in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Watch Fabian Hurzeler and Brighton players celebrate hard-earned win over Bournemouth - 'Always important to make supporters proud'
arts.sum: Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler said it is ‘always important to make the Seagulls supporters proud' after securing a valuable win at Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: They can sing what they want – Fabian Hurzeler out to make Brighton fans ‘proud’
arts.sum: Brighton’s away support at Bournemouth regularly chanted about Europe after a fourth win in six league games.
Andoni Iraola says Brighton were more clinical than his side after Bournemouth lost 2-1 against ten men at the Vitality Stadium.

arts.ttl: Pedro inspires Brighton to victory after late Bournemouth onslaught
arts.sum: Joao Pedro produced a goal and a superb assist to help 10-player Brighton move up to fifth in the Premier League with a 2-1 victory at wasteful Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: João Pedro orchestrates victory as 10-man Brighton hold on at Bournemouth
arts.sum: Brighton endured a nervy finale but João Pedro’s fourth goal of the season helped them to a fine 2-1 win at Bournemouth to continue Fabian Hürzeler’s flying start to life in the Premier League. João Pedro struck after four minutes and Kaoru Mitoma repeated the trick at the start of the second half to put the Seagulls in control. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Ten-man Brighton survive anxious finish to edge out Bournemouth
arts.sum: Goals at the start of each half earned Brighton a fourth victory from their last six Premier League matches.

arts.ttl: Brighton player ratings vs Bournemouth: Two 9s and three 8s as ten-man Albion dig deep to secure valuable three points in dramatic match
arts.sum: Brighton showed their class, and resilience, to secure a valuable 2-1 victory at Bournemouth.
